title: Easy Loader
content: Easy Loader Easily load and configure RoRooms without ever touching a line of code! Instead, use Roblox instances and attributes. Items ğŸ”§ Items are Tool objects, and go under Config.Items. title: Roblox - Easy loader âœ…â€‹
content: Get the RoRooms Loader modelInsert it from the ToolboxPlace into ReplicatedStorageStart configuring!

title: Roblox - Custom ğŸ”§â€‹
content: Download the RoRooms.rbxm file listed hereInsert RoRooms.rbxm into ReplicatedStorageRequire ReplicatedStorage.RoRoomsCall RoRooms:Start() from both the server and clientReference the API pages

title: Wally ğŸ¶â€‹
content: Copy the Wally detailsPaste it into your wally.toml dependenciesRun wally install

title: Configureâ€‹
content: </> RoRooms:Configure(Config:Â Config) â†’Â () Reconciles RoRooms' config to your liking. Config type available here

title: Promptâ€‹
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> RoRooms:Prompt(Prompt:Â Prompt) â†’Â () Prompts the client, with support for callback buttons. Prompt type available here

title: Features ğŸ“ƒâ€‹
content: ğŸ‘¤ Profiles - Change your nickname & bioğŸ”§ Items - Access roleplay itemsğŸ’ƒ Emotes - Use emotesğŸ‘¥ Friends - Join & invite friendsğŸŒ Worlds - Discover worldsâš™ï¸ Settings - Mute music, hide UI, etc

title: Worlds Network ğŸŒâ€‹
content: RoRooms provides its own network of worlds, secured via peer-to-peer ranking based on received teleports. At scale, this creates a network effect, where worlds promote similar worlds, and the network is uplifted as a whole.

title: The Players ğŸ™Œâ€‹
content: Players always come first, and they appreciate a superior experience. By giving them these features, and allowing them to traverse worlds so seamlessly, they'll (theoretically) spend more time in social worlds as a whole.
